definition: to lean over/to fall (go down)/to hide (in ambush)/to conceal oneself/to lie low/hottest days of summer/to submit/to concede defeat/to overcome/to subdue/volt

sentences.english: They generally use voltages under 35 kV.
sentences.chinese: 他們一般使用電壓在35千伏。

sentences.english: Liujiaxia to Shaanxi Province in cross-border 330 kilovolt transformer lines and over.
sentences.chinese: 劉家峽至陝西關中330千伏變電線路跨境而過。

sentences.english: Another example is shown in Fig. 2 for an 85 kV bus.
sentences.chinese: 另一個85千伏總線的例子如圖2所示。

sentences.english: The substation equipped with a transformer of 500 KVA is at the south of the plant.
sentences.chinese: 在工程的南邊有一座裝有五百千伏安變電器的變電站。

sentences.english: He was demonstrating hydrogen gas production at milliamp and kilovolt levels.
sentences.chinese: 他示範並千伏各級氫氣產量爲毫安。

sentences.english: This line of 220kV is the only transmission line between Hami electric grid and main Xinjiang electric grid.
sentences.chinese: 千伏樓哈線是哈密電網與新疆主網之間唯一的聯絡線。

sentences.english: Generally, they carry voltage greater than 35 to 65 kV.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，他們攜帶的電壓大於35至65千伏。

sentences.english: Output KVp is selected by the microprocessor prior to the start of x-ray.
sentences.chinese: 在開始X線放射之前通過微處理器選擇輸出千伏值。

sentences.english: The substation equipped with a transformer of 500 KVA is south of the plant.
sentences.chinese: 在工廠的南邊有一座裝有五百千伏安變壓器的變電站。

sentences.english: Twelve or more suggests the line carries more than 300 kV.
sentences.chinese: 十二個或更多的建議進行在線超過300千伏。

definition: volt-ampere (measure of apparent power in alternating current circuits)
a power station/an electricity generating plant
